member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_STATUS
member.summary: Defines the status of the Output Protection Manager (OPM).

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_STATUS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_NOT_REQUESTED
member.summary: Default status. Used to return the correct status when the content is unprotected.

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_STATUS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_FAILED_VM
member.summary: OPM failed because running in a virtual machined (VM).

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_STATUS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_FAILED_BDA
member.summary: OPM failed because there is no graphics driver and the system is using Basic Display Adapter (BDA).

member.name: MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_STATUS.MF_MEDIA_ENGINE_OPM_FAILED_UNSIGNED_DRIVER
member.summary: OPM failed because the graphics driver is not PE signed, falling back to WARP.
